Question
========
An object is released from rest and falls straight down without air resistance. Which of the following is true concerning its motion?

Answerlist
----------
* Its acceleration is constant.
* Its velocity is constant.
* Neither its acceleration nor its velocity is constant.
* Both its acceleration and its velocity are constant.

Solution
========
Only acceleration is constant for an object in free fall.
